Dialogue.Page: Mod: Archipelago Authors: Can’t Afford a Name
Archipelago is one of the two mods that won second place in the first mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community.

This mod has you warp to a new planet covered in a vast ocean and enclosed in a massive stone sphere. Using the clues that you find, you must find a way under the seafloor to solve the mystery surrounding this strange astral body.
Archipelago is a very interesting mod, combining organic mysteries and puzzles with fantastical environments and fascinating creatures. Definitely play this gem if you haven’t already.
